Package cz.ziki.had

Class FileUtils

java.lang.Object
cz.ziki.had.FileUtils
public class FileUtils extends Object
Utility class for handling player score saving and loading operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • FileUtils

      public FileUtils()

  • Method Details

    • savePlayerScore

      public static void savePlayerScore(String name, int score)
      Saves a player's score to a file. If the file contains more than 3 scores, it keeps only the top 3 highest scores.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player
      score - the score of the player

    • loadPlayerScores

      public static Map<String,Integer> loadPlayerScores()
      Loads the player scores from a file.
      Returns:
      a map of player names and their scores

    • getFilePath

      public static String getFilePath() throws IOException
      Gets the file path of the player scores file. If the file does not exist, it creates a new file.
      Returns:
      the absolute file path of the player scores file
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
